data: At half-past two of a sunny, sultry afternoon late in the month of August, Mr. Benjamin Staff sat at table in the dining-room of the Authors' Club, moodily munching a morsel of cheese and a segment of cast-iron biscuit and wondering what he must do to be saved from the death-in-life of sheer ennui.
half-past two | late in the month of August
Vance, Louis Joseph, 1879-1933; Keller, Arthur Ignatius, 1866-1924 [Illustrator]
